channel.title: Bank All Option by Items
channel.description:
Anyone knows why I can't bank All Items of an specific item?
If I have 2000 water runes, and right-click and choose ALL, it works..
BUT,
If I have 3 whips, and right-click and choose ALL, it does not work..
Is this bug similair to someone?
Thanks in forward! :)
